page_header.title: Mezete Hummus
page_header.pacecore: Shelf-stable with an authentic Middle Eastern taste

content.title: Fresh. Innovative. Efficient.
content.message: Pioneered after two decades of intensive research and development, this product’s unique Ultra-High Temperature sterilization allows for this hummus to be stored on a shelf, not in a refrigerator, saving valuable cooler space.

video.title: Sysco Cutting Edge Solutions: Mezete Hummus

section_header.title: Why We Love This
section_header.subtitle: Learn more about this great product
li: Shelf stable – no need to refrigerate before opening
100% natural ingredients
Made with 30% tahini content, 3x that of leading brands, for a rich, nutty flavor with a velvety smooth and creamy texture
This unique UHT sterilization process allows for this hummus to be made with no preservatives, for a fresh, authentic Middle Eastern taste
Available in two flavors, Classic and Roasted Red Pepper, and packed in 2.2-pound pouches or on-the-go packs for grab-and-go convenience

feature_products.message: Roasted Red Pepper Hummus Snack Pack

page_header.title: Casa Solana Classic Beef Birria
page_header.pacecore: Fully cooked Mexican Street Food Classic

content.title: Fresh. Innovative. Efficient.
content.message: The “star” of Mexican comfort food, birria is delicious served in tacos, tortas, and as a main entrée over rice, or used in a variety of global fusion mashups, including ramen, pizza/flatbreads, and more.

video.title: Sysco Cutting Edge Solutions: Casa Solana Beef Birria

section_header.title: Why We Love This
section_header.subtitle: Learn more about this great product
li: Casa Solana Classic Beef Birria is fully cooked and requires no additional prep
Packed in six 3.55-pound pouches for boil-in-bag convenience
Ensure production and consistency while conserving labor and reducing waste

card.text: Mexican Inspired Shakshuka with Beef Birria

page_header.title: Greco and Sons Beef Bacon
page_header.pacecore: Certified Halal, all beef product with a great smoky flavor

content.title: Fresh. Innovative. Efficient.
content.message: With unrivaled flavor, juiciness, and tenderness, each hearty slice has the incomparable taste and texture of beef combined with bold chef-inspired spices and the familiar smoky flavor of traditional pork bacon.

video.title: Sysco Cutting Edge Solutions: Greco & Sons Beef Bacon

section_header.title: Why We Love This
section_header.subtitle: Learn more about this great product
li: Crisps up quickly in the oven, pan or microwave offering low-labor convenience
Ready-to-serve as-is or to create signature dishes with ease
Contains less sodium than pork bacon, leaving room for customization and easy addition to all types of menus and applications
Halal certified, Greco and Sons Smoked Beef Bacon is an excellent alternative and upsell from traditional bacon

card.text: Beef Bacon Black and Blue Wedge Salad

page_header.back_message: Back to New Spring 2023 Cutting Edge Solutions
page_header.title: Sysco FreshPoint Natural Fresh Ready-to-Eat Beans
page_header.pacecore: Revolutionary packaging and a fresh, clean taste!

content.title: Fresh. Innovative. Efficient.
content.message: Fresh, kettle-cooked, natural pinto, black, and garbanzo beans in a convenient, ready-to-eat format with the quality, taste, and texture of dry beans that have been scratch-made. Domestically grown and harvested, these beans provide a true farm-to-fork product with no added salt, preservatives, or color additives.

video.title: Sysco Cutting Edge Solutions: FreshPoint Natural Ready-to-Eat Beans

section_header.title: Why We Love This
section_header.subtitle: Learn more about this great product
li: Clean label product – only 2 ingredients – Beans and Water!
Labor Saver! No soaking, draining, cooking or rinsing required!
Prepared al dente with a fresh flavor and texture that holds when used in all recipes, hot or cold
Packaged in BPA-free boilable and steam-able pouches that replace one #10 can. There’s no liquid to drain or empty cans to throw out

page_header.title: Greco and Sons Beef Pepperoni
page_header.pacecore: Certified Halal, all beef product with a traditional bold flavor

content.title: Fresh. Innovative. Efficient.
content.message: Crafted with passion, using the highest standards and traditional techniques, Greco and Sons Beef Pepperoni is made with only the finest USDA Choice, certified Halal meat, and blended with Italian seasonings for the perfect balance of savory and spice.

video.title: Sysco Cutting Edge Solutions: Greco & Sons Beef Pepperoni

section_header.title: Why We Love This
section_header.subtitle: Learn more about this great product
li: Halal certified, Greco and Sons Beef Pepperoni is an excellent alternative to make traditional pepperoni flavor accessible to guests with alternative diets
Greco and Sons Beef Pepperoni is fully cooked and cured, ready-to-serve as-is or create signature dishes with ease
Consistently sliced  and conveniently packed in two 5-pound bags for ease of storage and portioning, minimizing the potential for waste
Contains less sodium than traditional pepperoni

page_header.title: Keystone Scrub Less Enzymatic 2-in-1 Detergent & Presoak
page_header.pacecore: Powerful formula to make dish washing easier

content.title: Fresh. Innovative. Efficient.
content.message: Keystone applies better chemistry and leading-edge technologies to create innovative solutions around cleaning and sanitation solutions.

video.title: Sysco Cutting Edge Solutions: Keystone Scrub Less Enzymatic 2-in-1 Detergent & Presoak

section_header.title: Why We Love This
section_header.subtitle: Learn more about this great product
li: Proprietary, enzymatic formula eats away at grime, makes dishwashing quicker and easier
Highly concentrated formula – requires only 2 ounces per 10-gallon sink to achieve effectiveness
Pack size can be put in a liquid dispenser, go through a hand pump, or be manually poured
Enzymes are non-corrosive and safe for use in any kitchen environment
Extends the use-life of pots, pans and flatware
